hydroModels module¶

class hydroModels.HydroMorison(model_index, hydro_element, solidity, dwh=0.0, dw0=0.0)¶

Bases: object

For Morison hydrodynamic models, the code needs the nodes’ potions and the connections.

Thus, the input variable is the matrix of nodes

In addition, the solidity and constant flow reduction are also needed.

distribute_force(number_of_node)¶

Transfer the forces on line element to their corresponding nodes :return: hydroForces_nodes

force_on_element(net_wake, realtime_node_position, current_velocity, wave=0)¶
Parameters

  • net_wake – a object wake model

  • wave – a numpy list of wave on element, optional.

  • realtime_node_position – a list of positions of all nodes

  • current_velocity – np.array([ux,uy,uz]), Unit [m/s]

Returns

update the self.hydroForces_Element

hydro_coefficients(current_velocity, knot=False)¶
output_hydro_element()¶
class hydroModels.HydroScreen(model_index, elements, solidity, dwh=0.0, dw0=0.0)¶

Bases: object

For Screen hydrodynamic models, the code needs the panel’ potions

and the connections.

Thus, the input variable is the matrix of nodes and the connetions.

In addition, the solidity and constant flow reduction are also needed.

distribute_force(number_of_node)¶

Transfer the forces on net panels to their corresponding nodes :return: hydroForces_nodes

distribute_velocity(current_velocity, wave_velocity=0)¶
force_on_element(net_wake, realtime_node_position, current_velocity, wave=0)¶
Parameters

  • net_wake – net2net wake model

  • velocity_nodes – a numpy array of velocities for all nodes

  • wave – a numpy array of wave on element, optional.

  • realtime_node_position – a list of positions of all nodes

  • current_velocity – numpy array ([ux,uy,uz]), Unit [m/s]

Returns

update the self.hydroForces_Element

hydro_coefficients(inflow_angle, current_velocity, knot=False)¶
output_hydro_element()¶
screen_fsi(realtime_node_position, velocity_on_element, velocity_of_nodes=array([0, 0, 0]))¶
Parameters

  • velocity_of_nodes – a numpy array of velocities for all nodes

  • realtime_node_position – a numpy array of positions for all nodes

  • velocity_on_element – a numpy array on the centers of all net panels

Returns

update the self.hydroForces_Element and output the forces on all the net panels.
